activities: Insala, LLC supports, via an application service provider (ASP)framework, career transition and career development software used by individuals who are in career transition or in career development processes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: TRUSTe Safe Harbor Program as of 05/2002.
recoursemech:
If we receive any complaints regarding our compliance with the Safe Harbor one is directed to first contact Insala, LLC. If contacting Insala does not resolve the complaint, one may raise a complaint with TRUSTe via the Internet at 
http://www.truste.org/users/users_watchdog_intro.html
or fax at 408-494-4960, or mail at WatchDog Complaints, TRUSTe, 1180 Coleman Ave, Suite 202, San Jose, CA, USA 95110. 
For information about TRUSTe or the operation of TRUSTe's dispute resolution process, see http://www.truste.org/users/users_watchdog_intro.html or request this information from TRUSTe at any of the addresses listed above. 
The TRUSTe dispute resolution process shall be conducted in English.  The EU DPAs will cover HR Data.
